I’m not talking about minor aesthetic issues. When clinics are forced to evacuate, when med stockpiles are damaged, when scientists & professionals spend their time triaging flooding, rather than triaging patients – this is an urgent & serious problem that merits our attention.

Last year, a clinic was evacuated when antifreeze started leaking from the ceiling. A corroded pipe had caused the leak in the mechanical room, which you can see below. If the leak had occurred a few hours later, the waiting room of the clinic would have been filled w/ patients. pic.twitter.com/5Z5wKQ0pva

While H.R. 2740 provides @NIH a necessary $ increase to continue its scientific research & provide lifesaving medical treatments, NIH’s buildings – where scientists conduct groundbreaking research & medical professionals provide treatments – have fallen into alarming disrepair. pic.twitter.com/FJqNyXk4LR

"My amendment would provide a modest five-million dollar increase to @NIH’s Building & Facilities account to begin to address an estimated $2 billion backlog in maintenance & repairs." Watch live:  https://www.c-span.org/video/?461462-3/house-session&live …

"I rise today to offer an amendment to H.R. 2740 that would increase funding for the National Institutes of Health, which, I am proud to say, is headquartered in my district." @RepRaskin offering his amendment now.

SOON: I'll be on the House Floor offering an amendment to H.R. 2740 to increase funding for the National Institutes of Health (@NIH). Watch live:  https://www.c-span.org/video/?461462-3/house-session&live …

Here in America, the people rule, we speak freely under the First Amendment, and we have the Speech and Debate Clause in Congress.  We have no Kings, no Queens, no Titles of Nobility, and POTUS is not above the law!
Sorry Doug, but this is AMERICA, and I will continue to speak honestly, irreverently, and seditiously against this would-be King—and all others. Hope you join me!

In his letter, Rep. Collins takes me to task for saying Trump “turned the gov’t of the US into a moneymaking operation,” amazingly invoking sec 370 of Jefferson’s Manual, which says: “In Parliament, to speak irreverently or seditiously against the King is against order.” https://twitter.com/jeremyherb/status/1137055662503092224 …

This week on Capitol Hill, I was proud to vote in favor of four bills to #ProtectOurOceans: 
✅ H.R. 1237 the COAST Research Act
✅ H.R. 1716 the Coastal Communities Ocean Acidification Act 
✅ H.R. 1921 the Ocean Acidification Innovation Act 
✅ H.R. 988 the NEAR Act
June is #WorldOceansMonth and tomorrow is World Oceans Day! I'm committed to conserving, investing in, and rebuilding all ocean resources. pic.twitter.com/rbw2kZPGGM

The Trump Hotel is the Washington Emolument, a spectacle of prez. greed & payoffs by Kings, Princes & foreign agents. Trump says he’s disgorging “profits” from foreign states but the Constitution says he may not accept any foreign payments “of any kind” w/o Congressional consent.

The Emoluments Clause prevents POTUS from lining his pockets with foreign government money. But Trump never divested himself of his hotels, office towers, or golf clubs & keeps raking it in at the Trump Hotel, a “favorite stopover for influential foreigners who have an agenda." https://twitter.com/kylegriffin1/status/1136641457455022081 …
